title: Eat This? Diet for weight loss
creator: Evincii, Inc

extendedInfo.description: You ask "Should I eat this?"  Eat This? answers it.  It is as easy as 1-2-3:  Set your health objectives (weight control, diabetes, etc.); scan the barcode on the product; it shows the nutrition facts, health rating, taste review and healthy alternatives.  You can even create a shopping list on the fly.

reviews.comment: Great idea but doesn\'t work or recognize much when scanning bar codes. Seems easy enough to use. Just wish it worked. HTC EVO
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pretty great concept, but scanner only recognizes popular brands like kellogs special k.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only works on name brands this will not recognize codes for store brand items. Useless
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Bmi is not even accurate. And the average American doesn\'t measure in cms or kilometors.. Come on now.

reviews.comment: Great app.. would be better if users can add foods not in the database or find some way to get them added. Special K Low Fat Granola wasn\'t on there..

reviews.comment: Love the idea however I\'ve yet to scan anything that was actually in the database. Hate to uninstall but its pointless unless they update it.

reviews.title: Upset
reviews.comment: Would be really nice if I knew what foods were in the database! Every food that I seem to scan doesn\'t seem to be there! Not even the Chobani yogurts! What do I need to do to get inside the database to see the list of foods listed?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good idea...but very few products in the database. Unstalling and will look again later.

reviews.comment: It\'s a great concept. Problem is it doesn\'t recognize anything I scan. Anything from the Publix brand doesn\'t exist in this app.

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.comment: Great idea but none of the foods I have scanned are in the database. Would love to have this app once you all finish perfecting this. Uninstalled....

reviews.comment: Love it. Scans a lot of products

reviews.comment: This is a great app! It is helping me choose which foods are good for me! I love this app!
